description.narrative: In Finland both the early childhood education curriculum and the basic education curriculum aims to build a more sustainable future. Teachers play the key role in transmitting the sustainable lifestyle and thinking for the next generations. The UN Sustai nable Development Goals (Agenda 2030) can be exploited as an inspiration for multidisciplinary learning units bringing up the current themes of sustainable development from different perspectives. The main objective of the project is to strengthen teachers ' skills in terms of multidisciplinary approach to Agenda 2030 goals with different aged children and youth. It also aims to bring knowledge and skills to use the stories of the youth from the Global South as part of teaching. To support teachers? work we will produce an online-guide to using Agenda 2030 as a topic of multidisciplinary learning. For example the thematic set of Peace and equality addresses Agenda's goals 4101116 and 17 thus studying socially sustainable development through rights democracy and participation. Also we will produce video stories in developing countries where young people will share their ways of reinforcing sustainable development. Videos will be tailored as part of the thematic units to help teachers to include them. While usi ng the guide the teachers will increase students understanding of how each of us is linked to global world and can by its own actions contribute to global justice and sustainable development. With the new materials trainings and guidance we will strengthe n Maailmankoulu (The Global School) teachers' network at the municipal level. The teachers will spread the central ideas of this project forward to their regional teacher networks and hence put these ideas into practice on the local scale. During the schoo l year 2019-2020 Maailmankoulu will expand its activities to early childhood education and basic education of Jyvaskyla city. Maailmankoulu?s new material services especially the new multidisciplinary online-guide will also be marketed nationally. Furthe rmore Maailmankoulu will offer in-service trainings for teachers and teacher students together with other organizations.
